criterion: Provides false information about the prevention of dengue fever.
Does not mention the importance of mosquito control in preventing dengue fever.
Does not clarify what constitutes a high-risk group for dengue fever.
Uses a clear and concise language to explain the prevention methods.
Does not provide any information about the symptoms of dengue fever.
Provides information about the vaccine available for dengue fever.
Does not mention the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms worsen.
Provides information about the role of air conditioning in preventing dengue fever.
Uses a professional tone and avoids jargon in the explanation.
Does not provide any information about the transmission of dengue fever.
Provides information about the importance of using mosquito repellents.
